V

VuzixCamera - Class in com.vuzix.hardware
The VuzixCamera class is essentially a copycat of the standard Camera class, extended with specific cpcam methods: takePicture( ..., shotParams); setBufferSource(); reprocess();
VuzixCamera(int) - Constructor for class com.vuzix.hardware.VuzixCamera
 
VuzixCamera.Area - Class in com.vuzix.hardware
The Area class is used for choosing specific metering and focus areas for the camera to use when calculating auto-exposure, auto-white balance, and auto-focus.
VuzixCamera.Area(Rect, int) - Constructor for class com.vuzix.hardware.VuzixCamera.Area
